author: julianfoad
msg: Make some of the tests for 'svn mergeinfo' more realistic by actually
creating a branch and making changes on it instead of pretending that r1 in
the repository was merged to various places.  This is a precursor to making
the mergeinfo command check that the specified branches are ancestrally

msg: HBASE-5051 HBaseTestingUtility#getHBaseAdmin() creates a new HBaseAdmin instance at each call (N Keywal)

author: gozer
msg: Make sure we do have LWP before checking its version.
